snippet.title: The Hand of Merlin Official 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC & console June 14: https://store.steampowered.com/app/600610/The_Hand_of_Merlin/

The Hand of Merlin is a turn-based, rogue-lite RPG in which Arthurian legend clashes with cosmic horror within a medieval setting on the brink of apocalypse. Recruit a company of up to three mortal heroes and guide them on a desperate journey from Albion to Jerusalem. Trade with merchants, improve your heroes, unearth ancient relics, and save as many worlds as you can across the multiverse!

---

Never Miss Out on News
